text: Sybra donckieri is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Maurice Pic in 1939 on the basis of a specimen collected in Palembang, Sumatra.BioLib.cz - Sybra donckieri. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. The adult body measures 6 mm long and 2 mm wide. ==References== donckieri Category:Beetles described in 1939
title: Sybra donckieri
